data.message:
Hi Eminem :) 
I know that you will never read this comment but its ok .. Don't worry ! I just wanna say that you are my GOD , my entire LIFE ! I love so much Marshall :) and I'm so much proud of you :) you give me hope and power everyday :) I listen to your music every moment of the day and without it I can't get the straight that you give me every day , every hour , every minute and every single moment :) Thank you so much .. I know that you don't know me but you have been my new family :) 
-Kim 💘

replies.message: real shit man u a true fan much love for that and I also love Eminem his always there man u feel me he gets me through a lot he truly is a great rapper or make that the Best Rapper Alive nd of all time
Keep it real! He is just a guy!
A very phenomenal guy! But a guy!
Is it me or has all his fans have one thing in common, they can relate to his music?
Yup eminem rapped what was on his mind and from his heart.  Hes a great inspiration to me aswell and a hero.
